name: OGame AddFree
description:
No Gameforge Top Bar,
No Adds,
No Planet Data Overlay,
No Highlight links,
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document
domain("ogame.org"),
domain("ogame.com.br"),
domain("ogame.cz"),
domain("ogame.de"),
domain("ogame.dk"),
domain("ogame.com.es"),
domain("ogame.fr"),
domain("ogame.gr"),
domain("ogame.com.hr"),
domain("ogame.hu"),
domain("ogame.it"),
domain("ogame.jp"),
domain("ogame.lt"),
domain("ogame.lv"),
domain("ogame.nl"),
domain("ogame.no"),
domain("ogame.onet.pl"),
domain("ogame.com.pt"),
domain("ogame.ro"),
domain("ogame.rs"),
domain("ogame.ru"),
domain("ogame.se"),
domain("ogame.si"),
domain("ogame.sk"),
domain("ogame.com.tr"),
domain("ogame.tw"),
domain("ogame.us")
{

body#overview #mmonetbar,
body#alliance #mmonetbar,
body#imperium #mmonetbar,
body#resources #mmonetbar,
body#resourceSettings #mmonetbar,
body#station #mmonetbar,
body#trader #mmonetbar,
body#research #mmonetbar,
body#shipyard #mmonetbar,
body#defense #mmonetbar,
body#fleet1 #mmonetbar,
body#fleet2 #mmonetbar,
body#fleet3 #mmonetbar,
body#movement #mmonetbar,
body#galaxy #mmonetbar,
body#messages #mmonetbar,
body#premium #mmonetbar,
body#payment #mmonetbar,
body#ticket #mmonetbar,
body#station-moon #mmonetbar,
body#highscore #mmonetbar,
body#preferences #mmonetbar,
body#combatreport #mmonetbar,
body#network #mmonetbar,
body#changelog #mmonetbar,
body#tutorial #mmonetbar,
body#networkkommunikation #mmonetbar
{
    display: none!important
}

.no-commander
{
    top: 0!important
}

#banner_skyscraper
{
    display: none!important
}

#planetdata .overlay
{
    display: none!important
}

#planetDetails td
{
    color: #CCC!important;
    text-shadow: 0 0 4px black;
}

a.premiumHighligt .textlabel
{
    color: #767F88!important
}

.adviceWrapper
{
    display: none!important
}

}
